page.title: 11EDUCATION FOR TILMANSTONE
page.content: Pre_school children attend a morning {Playgroup.}5_11 year olds travel to{ Eastry, Northbourne, or Dover Roman Catholic,{Primary schools.} Those choosing{private education, have Northbourne Park, a{Preparatory {School}for chidren 8_13 yrs., with a Junior School for 3_7 year olds. Those over 11 go to Sir Roger Man_ wood, Sandwich; Dover Boys, or Girls, {Grammar Schools,}and{Secondary Schools in Sandwich and Dover to{16+. { Colleges}of{Further Education}are in Canterbury, Dover, Thanet and Folke_ stone. The{University of Kent}is situ_ ated at Canterbury. Many schools and colleges have{ {classes}for adults on a wide range of subjects, while{clubs}and{societies in the village will arrange lessons on subjects of special interest to their members.
